item.title: At least 43 dead in catastrophic Texas flooding and dozens missing from girls camp
item.description: Flash flooding slammed the Texas Hill Country overnight on Friday. At least 27 girls from a summer camp next to the Guadalupe River remain missing.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: How this long-lost Chinese typewriter from the 1940s changed modern computing
item.description: The concepts in the MingKwai typewriter underlie how Chinese, Japanese and Korean are typed today. The typewriter, patented in 1946, was found last year in an upstate New York basement.

item.title: Ukraine says it struck a Russian airbase as Russia sent drones into Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine said it struck a Russian airbase on Saturday, while Russia continued to pound Ukraine with hundreds of drones overnight, dashing hopes for a breakthrough in efforts to end the war.
